skills.name: Dragon's Might
skills.description: Inflicts continuous damage for 2 turns if you land a Critical Hit.

skill_effect.name: Continuous DMG
skill_effect.description: Deals 5% of monster's max HP as damage every turn

skills.name: Justice
skills.description: Channels burning rage to inflict great damage to an enemy. The damage increases according to the number of dead allies.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +10%
Damage +10%
Cooltime Turn -1
Damage +10%
Cooltime Turn -1
skills.multiplier_formula: <mark>ATK</mark>*(-5.5*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Percentage of living allies in range 0 to 1, with 1 being all allies alive. ">Living Ally %</mark> + 13.5)

skills.name: King's Rage (Passive)
skills.description: Gains immunity against inability effects and increases the Attack Power by 20% each time your allies are attacked. Accumulates up to 10 times. [Automatic Effect]

skill_effect.name: Auto Effect
skill_effect.description: The skill effect is automatically triggered.

skill_effect.name: Immunity
skill_effect.description: Monster is immune to all negative status effects
